item.description:
Ease your mind
Calm your body
Increase your creativity
And sense of well being

Drop in relaxation sessions
Every Saturday 4-5pm
During the month of February and March

Cost: $5 per session
Location: 675 Massachusetts Ave., 11th Floor
Cambridge, MA
(Next to Central Sq T. Station, Red Line)

The benefits of relaxation include improved health, well being and overall happiness. Use this opportunity to practice most common relaxation exercises in a warm, supportive group atmosphere.
item.name: Stress Reduction and Relaxation Group Meetup
